answers.text:
Hi Pamela, 
Thank you for your interesting question on “pump top signs.” Unfortunately at this time we do not have many articles on this specific topic. However, I was able to round up some interesting article which mention gas station signage and discuss signage in general. I hope you find these articles useful and that if anyone has anything to contribute they should feel free to! 
•   Here is a sign ordinance from the San Jose Municipal Code. This sign ordinance discusses all the types of signs that could be found in a community and the codes and information that they use to regulate them. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/3206
•   The zoning Code of Aiken, SC includes a comprehensive section on signs and can be found between pages 26 and 34 in the manual. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/302262
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance is looking for policies, ordinances, resolutions, and/or regulations related to “pump top signs”.  That is regulations re: gas station pump top advertising, such as videos.
Thank you in advance for sending your documents/links.
Pam

Western Regional Director
